LanguageData.MilkableColonists.breastGrowthDisabledDe: Default: off. Enable to prevent breasts from growing due to milk production or milking.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.flatChestGivesMilkDesc: Default: off (flat chest has no room for milk production); Enable to have a minimum milk production.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.ignoreReproductiveStag: Default: off. Only enable if you have races where reproductive stage isn't set properly.
